transform","artifact":{"name":"wrangler-transform","version":"4.9.1-SNAPSHOT","scope":"SYSTEM"},"properties":{"field":"*","precondition":"AUFFX !~ 'X'","directives":"set-column Line '000001'

set-column OrderId PLNUM

set-column OrderSiteValue PWWRK

set-column OrderTypeValue PAART

set-column OrderSupplierId "Mfg"

set-column PartName MATNR

set-column PartSiteValue PWWRK

set-column StartDate PSTTR

set-column DockDate ""

set-column DockToStockLeadTime WEBAZ

set-column DueDate ( PEDTR !~ null ? PEDTR :${FutureDate} )

set-column TotalQuantity GSMNG

set-column Quantity GSMNG

set-column StatusValue "Firm"

set-column ShipmentSupplierId "Mfg"

set-column FixedLeadTime 0

set-column VarLeadTime 0

set-column PreShipLT 0

set-column OriginalDueDate ""

set-column TransactionSequence 1

set-column TransitTime 0

set-column UnconstrainedQuantity 0

set-column UnitPrice 0

set-type DockToStockLeadTime decimal
set-column DockToStockLeadTime DockToStockLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type TotalQuantity decimal
set-column TotalQuantity TotalQuantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type Quantity decimal
set-column Quantity Quantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type FixedLeadTime decimal
set-column FixedLeadTime FixedLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type VarLeadTime decimal
set-column VarLeadTime VarLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

Add default value for Line
---

set-column Line '000001'

---
Remove leading zeros from PLNUM and rename it to OrderId
---

find-and-replace :PLNUM s/^0+(?!$)//g
set-column OrderId PLNUM

---
Rename columns as per sink
---

set-column Order_WERKSPlant PWWRK
set-column OrderType PAART

---
Add default value for OrderSupplierId
---

set-column OrderSupplierId "Mfg"
set-column ShipmentSupplierId "Mfg"

---
Remove leading zeros from MATNR and rename it to PartName
---

find-and-replace :MATNR s/^0+(?!$)//g
set-column PartName MATNR

---
Rename columns
---
set-column Part_WERKSPlant PWWRK
set-column StartDate PSTTR

---
Assign default null value for DockDate
---
set-column DockDate ""
set-column DockToStockLeadTime WEBAZ
set-column DueDate ( PEDTR !~ NULL ? PEDTR :${FutureDate} )

---
Total Quantity and Quantity
---
set-column TotalQuantity GSMNG
set-column Quantity GSMNG

--
Assign default values for Status, ShipmentSupplierId, Leadtime  and other fields
--
set-column Status "Firm"
set-column ShipmentSupplierId "No_Supplier"
set-column FixedLeadTime 0
set-column VariableLeadTime 0
set-column PreShipLeadTime 0
set-column OriginalDueDate ""
set-column TransactionSequence 1
set-column TransitTime 0
set-column UnConstrainedQuantity 0
set-column UnitPrice 0



---
convert to decimal
---
set-type DockToStockLeadTime decimal
set-column DockToStockLeadTime DockToStockLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type TotalQuantity decimal
set-column TotalQuantity TotalQuantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type Quantity decimal
set-column Quantity Quantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type FixedLeadTime decimal
set-column FixedLeadTime FixedLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type VariableLeadTime decimal
set-column VariableLeadTime VariableLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type PreShipLeadTime decimal
set-column PreShipLeadTime PreShipLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type TransitTime decimal
set-column TransitTime TransitTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type UnConstrainedQuantity decimal
set-column UnConstrainedQuantity UnConstrainedQuantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type UnitPrice decimal
set-column UnitPrice UnitPrice.setScale(4,4)","createDate":1.68147142526E12}]}},"outputSchema":"{"name":"etlSchemaBody","type":"record","fields":[{"name":"Line","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"OrderId","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"OrderSiteValue","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"OrderTypeValue","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"OrderSupplierId","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"PartName","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"PartSiteValue","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"StartDate","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"DockDate","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"DockToStockLeadTime","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"DueDate","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"TotalQuantity","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"Quantity","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"StatusValue","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"ShipmentSupplierId","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"FixedLeadTime","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"VarLeadTime","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"PreShipLT","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"OriginalDueDate","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"TransactionSequence","type":["int","null"]},{"name":"TransitTime","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"UnconstrainedQuantity","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"UnitPrice","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]}]}","inputSchema":[{"name":"PLAF
